title: Introduction to Smart Energy Management Based on Non-Invasive Load Monitoring (NILM)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Case study on NILM application through regional energy usage pattern analysis, including education on data collection and visualization using smartphones.

learning_goals: The core principles of NILM technology and its application methods for residential energy management can be explained
Power usage pattern classification problems can be solved using simple machine learning models
NILM solutions reflecting regional energy usage characteristics can be designed by referencing the Quebec case study

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
